name: User Profile UI
description: UI components, hooks and stores for user profile management. Includes user list display, user detail view, and state management for user operations.

components.name: UserList
components.description: Displays a list of users with delete functionality

hooks.name: useUser
hooks.description: Hook for managing single user state and operations

hooks.name: useUsers
hooks.description: Hook for managing user list state and CRUD operations
hooks.example: const { users, fetchUsers, createUser, updateUser, deleteUser } = useUsers()

stores.name: useUserStore
stores.description: Zustand store for user state management

types.name: UserProfile
types.description: User profile interface with id, email, name, avatar, bio

types.name: UserListFilter
types.description: Filter options for user list (search, sortBy, sortOrder, limit, offset)

ai.summary: Complete UI module for user profile management with components, hooks, stores and types. Includes UserList component, useUser/useUsers hooks for state management, and Zustand store for global user state.

author: Bebarter Team
